Name: Monarch Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Wonderfully floral and minty - worthy of a right royal drinker.
History: Created in 2003 by Douglas Ankrah at Townhouse bar in Knighsbridge, London, England.
